statements: DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'failed' AND amount < 100;
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND amount > 500
DELETE FROM admin_notifications WHERE admin_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 200 AND alert_id = 5002;
